name: 10th International Conference of Managing Value and Supply Chains (MaVaS 2024)
content: 10th International Conference of Managing Value and Supply Chains (MaVaS 2024) is a peer- reviewed forum for presenting articles that contribute new results in all areas of value and supply chain management. The conference provides a platform to disseminate new ideas and new research, advance theories, and propagate best practices in the management of value and supply chain management, looking across both product and service-based businesses.
